title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 123: Featuring Shane Doan
description:
On Thursday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys have on the ultimate team guy and Biz's former teammate, Shane Doan. Doaner talks about his time playing with Biz and in Arizona, some off the ice stuff and some great stories. The boys also get into some talk about all the major NHL news that has been happening. From Coach Q being fired to Lucic to the Senators, the boys covered it all.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
